regen.new_specification: The system shall provide options for users to select and send emoticons within their messages to enhance communication.

regen.absent_element: offer of emoticons for enriching messages
regen.new_specification: The application shall provide emoticons that users can use to enrich their messages.
The application shall allow users to select and send emoticons within their messages.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
